assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Dr. Syngal is a consultant for Myriad Genetics and Digital China Health Technologies, and has rights to an inventor portion of the licensing revenue from PREMM<sub>5</sub>. The authors report no other conflicts of interest.
